price: (28) And inform them that the water is shared between them,[1584] each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ
footnotes: [1584]- i.e., between the tribe of Thamūd and the she-camel - a day for each to drink.
